title: Built-in tool verification test
description: Testing built-in beads after external supermemory removal

title: Reduce Musashi prompt from 578 → 200 lines
description:
Current: 578 lines. Target from doc-09/10: ~200 lines.
Move more content to skills. Keep only essential routing/orchestration logic.

title: Add complexity tiers to Musashi
description:
From doc-04 agentic-dev-starter analysis:
- Add TRIVIAL/SIMPLE/MODERATE/COMPLEX classification
- Add push-back culture with red flags table
- File count rules: <3 direct, 3+ spawn agents

title: Implement phased commands from agent-os
description:
From doc-03 analysis, create multi-phase commands:
- /shape-spec (scope & design)
- /write-spec (detailed specification)
- /create-tasks (task breakdown)
- /implement-tasks (phased implementation)
- /orchestrate-tasks (orchestration)

title: Test beads update tool - UPDATED
description: Temporary test issue - delete after verification

title: Agent consolidation: 12+ → 10 agents with robot codes
description:
Merge agents as planned in doc-08:
- Tantei + Koji → G5 (debugger)
- Sakka + Bunshi → W7 (writer)
- B3 as actual builder (not router)
- Drop Senshi, Seichou, Tsunagi
- Rename all to robot codes (X1, R2, B3, D4, G5, C6, W7, A8)

title: Create .opencode/specs/ folder structure
description:
From doc-03/08: Create spec folders for features.
Structure: .opencode/specs/[feature-name]/ with spec.md, tasks.md

title: Test compaction fixes in production
description: Compaction fixes committed (b00a574) but need live testing: parallel hooks via Promise.allSettled, cancel detection for abort/499, non-blocking setTimeout triggers. Test by filling context to 80%+ and triggering compaction.

title: Create missing skills: elysia-stack, coding-style, error-handling, test-writing
description:
Skills planned but not created:
- elysia-stack (Elysia + typebox patterns)
- coding-style (general conventions from agent-os standards)
- error-handling (error patterns)
- test-writing (testing standards)
- agent-orchestration (spawn examples)

title: Fix flaky session-notification tests
description: 2 flaky tests in session-notification.test.ts due to async timing. Tests: 'should trigger notification for main session when idle' and 'should not send duplicate notification for same session'. Root cause: idleConfirmationDelay too short (10ms) for async operations.
